messages.subject: Little New Mexico conference in September
messages.msgSnippet: This was just posted to the New Mexico list The Rio Grande Homescooling Network has its website and a downloadable conference registration form online at
messages.messageBody:
This was just posted to the New Mexico list


"The Rio Grande Homescooling Network has its website and a downloadable
conference registration form online at www.rghomeschooling.org - check it out
and let us know what you think!"

This site is BRAND new and so there are still a couple of glitches, but if
those of you with New Mexico resource lists could add it that would be great.
And if you have any homeschooling friends in New Mexico, please let them
know about this because typical of the cultural and geographical realities of
New Mexicans, we're living in a degree of happy isolation. Sometimes it
takes a year for word to get around about something, and we only have a few
weeks until the conference.

Thanks

Sandra
